reviewText: very good dvds i haven't watched it all but its interesting to see the marines in action in different places i recommend this dvd its a good one!

they give the impression that they won the Pacific War all by themselves. Those of us of my generation know that this is not so. There were other
There were other countries involved with their soldiers as well as soldiers from their own country. I am interested in all ASPECTS of ww2 and
the history of the those involved. I personally had family who fought with the Aust. army in New GUINEA.
What can I say? It's about our great US Marines in WW2. Covers Midway, Guadalcanal, Bougainville, and Rabaul. Done very well and it goes very quickly, unfortunately -115 minutes.
